bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1994.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: 1. New observations on Phase 1 of the Great Basilica. - 2. The southern wing of the large brick structure to the east of the Great Basilica. - 3. Re-examination of the tower at the north-west corner of the fortification. - 4. Further progress in the Peristyle-House. - 5. The so-called Ostraca-House.
GROSSMANN Peter, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1994.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 34 (1995) pp. 149-159, 3 figg. et pll. IX-XII.
